text:
NEWS Star Bodies! Get Gwen Stefani's Rock Hard Abs With 3 Simple Exercises OK! Staff March 28 2013, Published 5:12 a.m. ET

Article continues below advertisement

Gwen Stefani is no doubt known for rocking stadiums baring her sassy, strong six-pack. The secret to getting this look is working all 3 areas of your abdominal muscles, and that’s exactly what this workout will help you do. Let’s get working on sculpting that sexy six-pack! Circuit Works trainer Alycia Darby gives us the run down on achieving a super flat stomach as part of OK!'s 12 Week Countdown To Summer!

Article continues below advertisement

STAR BODIES! GET BLAKE LIVELY'S LOVELY TONED LEGS Exercise #1 : Pulsing Straight Leg Bicycles. Lay on your back and bring both feet up 6 inches off the ground. Keeping your legs straight, lift one leg up to a 45 degree angle while simultaneously bringing your opposite elbow toward your lifted straight leg. Pulse here for 3 counts then switch to the other side. Keep your legs off the ground and the core engaged the whole time to work upper and lower abs. Repeat 10 on each side.

Article continues below advertisement

CELEB DIET TIPS: 'BIGGEST LOSER' TRAINER BOB HARPER ON GETTING BIKINI READY FOR THE SUMMER Exercise #2 : Side Plank Kick-Crunch . Lay on your right side with legs straight and stacked on top of each other, press up on your right forearm and use your abs to lift your hips off the floor into a side plank. Lift your left leg up slightly and very slowly bring forward for a crunch, then return to the starting position. Move very slowly to train your stabilizing muscles around the core. Repeat 10 reps and switch sides.

Article continues below advertisement

Want OK! each day? Sign up here!

HEALTHY EATS: PREPARE YOUR HOME FOR WEIGHT LOSS SUCCESS Exercise #3 : Around-the-World Abs . Lay flat on your back with hand beneath your hips to protect your sacrum. Lift your legs six inches off the ground. Keeping your legs and feet straight and together, start to draw a circle with your toes by moving your legs clockwise so that mid way through the rotation your legs are at a 90-degree angle. Once your legs reach a 90-degree angle contract your abs and lift feet up towards the ceiling. Then continue the circular motion, making sure your legs don’t touch the ground. Repeat this motion for 10 reps, then rotate counter clockwise for another 10 reps.
title: Star Bodies! Get Gwen Stefani's Rock Hard Abs With 3 Simple Exercises
